creator: nori1@dolphin.c.u-tokyo.ac.jp
text:
In the web site for APR, I find three minor mistakes:

1. A link from the top page to the announcement page for 0.9 is incorrect.

2. An anchor text for downloading apr-util-0.9.12.tar.gz is incorrect.

3. A page explaining Anonymous SVN refers to a ViewCVS repository browser,
which is now replaced by ViewVC.
This one is not a problem since the page is redirected.

I'll attach a patch to fix them.

Created attachment 18336
Patch for fixing the reported bug.

Here is a patch to fix the mentioned three mistakes.
creator: nori1@dolphin.c.u-tokyo.ac.jp
rooneg@electricjellyfish.net
text:
Thanks for the patch.  Committed to the repos in r409219 and the site has been
updated, although it'll take a little while for it to rsync over to the
production web site.
